title: L'argent des Autres = Other People's Money
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Nancy Markham.
description: Henri Rainier, a bank director, is unwillingly implicated in a financial fraud and laid off. Convinced he is being set up by others in the bank, he decides to investigate a number of dubious transactions and discovers a vast real estate swindle. Awards: Prix Louis Delluc, 1978 ; French Academy of Cinema (Cesars) 1978: Best Director for Christian de Chalonge, Best Film.  Credits: Producers, Michelle de Broca, Henri Lassa, Adolphe Viezzi ; director, Christian de Chalonge ; writers, Pierre Dumayet, Christian de Chalonge ; photography, Jean-Louis Picavet ; music, Patrice Mestral. Cast: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Claude Brasseur, Michel Serrault, Catherine Deneuve, Juliet Berto, Francois Perrot.
